ygData.msgSnippet: i d say there are VERY profitable ways to hunt....i log in....havent played in two weeks....and in the first hour I m back I make 250 pp....that s a nice lil
ygData.messageBody:
i'd say there are VERY profitable ways to hunt....i log in....havent played
in two weeks....and in the first hour I'm back I make 250 pp....that's a
nice lil cash sum ;)


Bann

From: Curtis Bennett [mailto:die_kluge@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 10:37 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Dwarven Cleric


From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>

Very profitable way to hunt? Sounds like you're exploiting to me. I
don't know any 15th level anythings that can shell out the 1000+ pp
for an observer staff. That's a lot of greater lightstones and bronze
spears.


>From: "Aaron Mattingly" <kistoga123@...>
